title: Performance Upgrade
description: Boost your car performance and improve fuel economy standards. We offer a wide variety of modification options for your rims and tyres, brakes, intake and exhaust modifications and so on.

otherServices.title: Tire repair and replacement
otherServices.description: Motorify have well trained and experienced technicians on ground to repair and replace your tires, whether there is a slow leak or your tire pressure monitoring system light is on, trust us to proffer the best solution for your tire according to your vehicle manufacturer’s specification.

otherServices.title: Vehicle alignment
otherServices.description: Improve the accuracy and precision of your vehicle camber, caster and toes angles with our wheel alignment services. We have a state of the art computerized technology which will inspect vehicle suspension and steering systems, including tire air pressure and tire condition.

otherServices.title: Throttle response
otherServices.description: Get the vehicle responsiveness you desire, increase your vehicle’s power output with every acceleration. We clean dirty fuel filter or make replacements, to avoid engine issues and improve fuel economy for all brands and models including high performance vehicle.

otherServices.title: Shock and Strut Replacement
otherServices.description: Keep your ride smooth. Help optimize the performance and longevity of your suspension system with a visit to Motorify.

title: Engine Maintenace and Diagnostics
description: We run comprehensive diagnostic test scans on your car's components like the engine, transmission oil tank and many more. From check engine lights and spark plugs to serpentine belts and radiator hoses, Motorify, can help maintain your engine’s optimal performance, reliability and longevity.

otherServices.title: Serpentine belt replacement
otherServices.description: Is your serpentine belt suffering from age and wear? At Motorify, we visually inspect the belt for fraying, splitting, glazing or any other damage. We also carry out installation of new serpentine belts.

otherServices.title: Spark plug replacement
otherServices.description: Do you remember the last time you changed your spark plugs? The Motorify spark plug replacement service, performed according to your manufacturer's recommendations, helps to ensure optimal performance.

otherServices.title: Engine diagnostic services
otherServices.description: Using a diagnostic tool, Motorify scans for trouble codes and provides you with a written description of any codes found to help ensure optimal performance, reliability and longevity of your engine.

title: Air Conditioning Evac
description: Our air conditioning evacuation and recharge are designed to allow periodic maintenance instead of complete ac repairs. We inspect, evacuate and recharge with the appropriate refrigerant according to your vehicle manufacturer's specifications. This ensures that you have an efficient cooling system

otherServices.title: Compressor replacement
otherServices.description: Trust our team of expert technicians to identify and replace your compressor accodring to your model and maunfactures specification, for the perfect cooling effect of your vehicle.

otherServices.title: Gas Refill
otherServices.description: Do you remember the last time you refilled your gas? Motorify will help you keeep track of your gas refill and notify you at every given time to avoid impromptu lose of your cooling system .

otherServices.title: Air Conditioning recharge services
otherServices.description: Visit Motorify, to carry out your AC recharge to avoid lose and contamination ofyour air conditioning system

title: Brake inspection and brake replacement services
description: From brake pads to brake fluid, Motorify provides the services you need to help keep your stopping power responsive and reliable  and, get you back on the road quickly. Our services include a proper visual inspection of your vehicle's brake system and replacement of brake fluids and pads

otherServices.title: Brake fluid exchange
otherServices.description: Help keep your brake system working efficiently and safely with a visit to Motorify for a brake fluid exchange. Our service includes a visual inspection of the brake system, replacement with new fluid that meets or exceeds your vehicle manufacturer’s specifications and proper disposal of the used fluid.

otherServices.title: Brake Inspection
otherServices.description: Avoiding costly repairs and maintaining your peace of mind begins with regular brake inspections. Motorify performs a visual inspection of your brake system, measures the brake pads and provides service recommendation. Contact us for more information about a complimentary brake inspection with a tire rotation.

otherServices.title: Brake Replacement
otherServices.description: Motorify provides brake replacement without stopping your day. Whether you need pads, shoes, rotors or drums, a Jiffy Lube® brake service helps get your vehicle brake system back to manufacturer specifications.

title: Battery Maintenance and Replacement
description: Whether you need a battery tested, a new battery or the terminals cleaned, motorify offers the battery services you need to help keep your starting charging system running efficiently. Our services include include terminal cleaning, cable replacement, tightening connections, testing, replacement and proper disposal of used battery.

otherServices.title: Battery Maintainance Services
otherServices.description: Help keep your engine starting reliably with a visit to Motorify. Our battery maintenance services include terminal cleaning, cable replacement and tightening connections.

otherServices.title: Battery Replacement
otherServices.description: No one wants to be stranded with a dead battery. If you can’t rely on your battery, rely on Motorify. Our battery replacement service includes testing, replacement and proper disposal of your used battery.

title: Auto Glass and Headlights Services
description: For your headlight cleaning, windshield repair, treatment and wiper replacement, light bulb inspection and cleaning you can trust motorify to deliver topnotch service to  ensure your view from the driver's seat is clear and well-lit.

otherServices.title: Windshield Treatment
otherServices.description: Like wax for your windshield, a windshield treatment at Motorify helps rain, sleet and snow slide off your windshield.

otherServices.title: Headlight Cleaning
otherServices.description: Maybe it’s cloudy or perhaps it’s yellow. Whatever it is, your headlights don’t look or perform like they used to. At Motorify, our headlight cleaning service is a quick and convenient way to help restore your headlight appearance and performance.

otherServices.title: Windshield Wiper Replacement
otherServices.description: Can't see through the streaks? If your wipers are chattering, skipping or streaking, visit Motorify for quick and convenient windshield wiper replacement.

title: Fluid replacement and exchange services
description: Motorify fluid services helps maintain your vheicle's performance in areas such as brakes, transmission, radiator coolant and more.

otherServices.title: Brake Fluid Exchange
otherServices.description: Help keep your brake system working efficiently and safely with a visit to Motorify for a brake fluid exchange. Our service includes a visual inspection of the brake system, replacement with new fluid that meets or exceeds your vehicle manufacturer’s specifications and proper disposal of the used fluid.

otherServices.title: Fluid Top Off
otherServices.description: We don't forget about your vehicle between oil changes. With every Motorify Signature Service Oil Change, we provide complimentary fluid top off service on vital fluids including motor oil (the same type of oil purchased originally), transmission, power steering, differential/transfer case and washer fluid. Just stop by within 3,000 miles of your service mileage and we will top off up to 2 quarts per fluid, as needed.

otherServices.title: Fuel Cleaning System
otherServices.description: Visit Motorify for fuel system cleaning where we use multi-step cleaners to remove deposits and residue from your fuel system, injectors and combustion chamber.

otherServices.title: Tranmission Fluid Exchange
otherServices.description: Like an oil change for your transmission, help optimize performance and longevity of this key system with a visit to Motorify for a transmission fluid exchange.

title: Vehicle Filter Services
description: Whether filtering a fluid or the air, Motorify filter services help ensure optimal performance and vehicle longevity

otherServices.title: Cabin Air Filter Replacement
otherServices.description: Help optimize the performance and longevity of your climate system with a visit to Motorify for a cabin air filter replacement.

otherServices.title: Transmission Filter Replacement
otherServices.description: Protect your investment. Help optimize performance and longevity of your automatic transmission with a visit to Motorify for a transmission filter replacement

otherServices.title: Fuel Filter Replacement
otherServices.description: Help optimize the performance and longevity of your fuel system with a visit to Motorify for a fuel filter replacement

otherServices.title: Engine Air Filter Replacement
otherServices.description: Let your engine breathe easy. Help optimize the performance and longevity of your engine with a visit to Motorify for an engine air filter replacement.

title: Tire rotation, Installation and Replacement
description: Whatever your tire needs, rotating, balancing, repair or even rplacement Motorify tire services will back on the road fast

otherServices.title: Tire Installation
otherServices.description: For quick and convenient tire installation, visit Motorify for new tire installation service.

otherServices.title: Tire Pressure Monitoring System
otherServices.description: TPMS light on? Visit Motorify and let us inspect, reset and/or service your TPMS system.

otherServices.title: Tire Repair
otherServices.description: Have a flat tire? A Motorify tire repair service will get you back on the road quickly. Contact us for more details about tire repair.

otherServices.title: Wheel Balancing
otherServices.description: Bad vibrations? To help ensure a smooth ride and tire longevity, Motorify offers wheel balancing service

title: Vehicle Inspection and Diagnostics
description: We offer car quick and convenient inspections and testing services for your new or preowned vehicles.We offer the services you need to help ensure your vehicle meets local emissions and safety requirements

otherServices.title: Brake Inspection
otherServices.description: Avoiding costly repairs and maintaining your peace of mind begins with regular brake inspections. Motorify performs a visual inspection of your brake system, measures the brake pads and provides a service recommendation. Contact us for more information about a complimentary brake inspection with a tire rotation.

otherServices.title: Vehicle Emission Testing
otherServices.description: If your vehicle is due for its emissions inspection, Motorify has you covered with quick and convenient service

otherServices.title: Light Bulb Inspection and Replacement
otherServices.description: Have a light out? It can be challenging to check all of your vehicle’s exterior lights yourself, so let Motorify inspect and replace them for you.

otherServices.title: State Vehicle Inspections
otherServices.description: Does your vehicle need a check-up? If your vehicle is due for its local or state inspection, Motorify has you covered with quick and convenient service.
